title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Separate Collection (Deposit
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Separate Collection (Deposit 

Return Scheme) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited separate collection (deposit return scheme) (amendment) regulation 2024 interpretation

title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Separate
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Separate 

Collection (Deposit Return Scheme) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 33 of 2024). 

Amendment of Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean separate collection (deposit return scheme) regulation 2024 (s.i no 33 2024) amendment regulation 2 principal regulation

title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations are amended by substituting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations are amended by substituting 

the definition of “distributor” for the following definition: 

“ “distributor” means a person who sells or supplies an in-scope product by 
wholesale but shall not include a producer, and “distribute” shall be construed 
accordingly; ” 

Amendment of Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 3 regulation 2(1) principal regulation amended substituting definition distributor following definition distributor mean person sell supply in-scope product wholesale shall include producer distribute shall construed accordingly amendment regulation 5 principal regulation

title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 

5(1)(e) the following: 

“ (e) establish and maintain a register of all retailers who are exempted from the 
obligation to take back in-scope bottles and in-scope containers under 
Regulation 14(2)(f); ”
text_norm: 4 principal regulation amended substituting regulation 5(1)(e) following (e) establish maintain register retailer exempted obligation take back in-scope bottle in-scope container regulation 14(2)(f)

title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation
text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 

5(1)(l) the following: 

1 OJ No L155, 12.6.2019, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [555] 3 

“ (l) issue a certificate of exemption to retailers who are exempted from the 
obligation to take back in-scope bottles and in-scope containers under 
Regulation 14(2)(f); ” 

Amendment of Regulation 19 of the Principal Regulations

title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: 6. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation
text_raw:
6. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 

19(2) the following: 

“ (2) An authorised person may exercise the powers conferred on such a 
person under section 14 of the Act of 1996 for the purposes of enforcing 
Regulations 13(1), 13(2), 13(3), 13(4), 13(5), 13(6)(a), 13(6)(b), 13(6)(c), 
13(6)(d), 13(6)(e), 14(1)(a), 14(1)(b), 14(1)(c), 14(2)(a), 14(2)(b), 14(2)(c), 
14(2)(d), 14(2)(e), 14(2)(f), 14(2)(g), 14(2)(h), 14(2)(i), 14(3)(a), 15(1)(a), 
15(1)(b), 15(1)(c), 15(1)(d), 15(1)(e), 15(1)(f), 15(1)(g), 15(2)(a), 16(a), 16(b), 
16(c), 16(d) and 16(e) of these Regulations and, accordingly, a reference to that 
Act includes a reference to these Regulations. ” 

Amendment of the First Schedule to the Principal Regulations

title: Parliament and of the Council of 5 June 2019 on the reduction of the impact of
heading: 7. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for the First
text_raw:

Regulations

number opposite is fixed at the amount mentioned in column (3) of that Schedule 
at that reference number.
